title: For you madam. [No. 68/01] = Pour vous madame
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: A Paris Institute trains the most famous fashion models in the world; The third Festival of Summer Fashion on the south coast of France a great success; A large number of foreign exhibitors at the Paris Jewellery and Watchmakers Exhibition; 191 paintings, documents and other objects conncected with the eldest daughter of Victor Hugo.
